title: Greek Chicken That We Can’t Stop Eating
subtitle: Ridiculously juicy and flavorful grilled chicken thighs
description: A marinated Greek-style chicken that’s simple, smoky, and perfect for any night.
instructions: Put the chicken into a large bowl or zip top bag.
Add remaining ingredients and mix really well to coat.
Cover or seal and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, up to overnight.
Grill chicken until golden brown and cooked through, flipping as needed.
Remove and let rest for a couple minutes before serving.

sections.content:
Prep: 10 min
Marinate: 2+ hrs
Cook: 15-20 min
Total: ~2.5 hrs

Course: Dinner
Cuisine: Greek
Servings: 4-6
Cost: Moderate
